Cloud & Modernization

Business Service Mapping

Map IT infrastructure to business services for better decision-making, impact analysis, and service optimization.

Solution Overview

Verto Wave's Business Service Mapping solution provides a clear and dynamic view of how your IT infrastructure supports your critical business services. In today's complex IT environments, understanding the intricate dependencies between applications, servers, networks, and databases is essential for effective IT operations and strategic decision-making. Our solution automatically discovers and maps the relationships between your IT components and the business services they deliver. This provides a single, unified view that bridges the gap between IT and the business, enabling you to prioritize efforts based on business impact, accelerate incident resolution, and manage change more effectively. With Business Service Mapping, you can move from a component-centric to a service-centric view of your IT, ensuring that your technology investments are directly aligned with business outcomes.

Key Features

Feature

Description

Automated Discovery & Mapping

Automatically discover all IT components (CIs) and their dependencies, creating and maintaining an accurate, real-time map of your business services.

Dynamic Visualization

Visualize your business services in a hierarchical model, showing the relationships between applications, middleware, databases, servers, and network devices.

Impact Analysis

Simulate the impact of a planned change or an unplanned outage on your business services, enabling you to proactively manage risk and prioritize responses.

Quantified Benefits

Accelerate Root Cause Analysis by up to 70%

By providing a clear view of service dependencies, you can quickly identify the root cause of incidents and reduce Mean Time to Resolution (MTTR).

Reduce Change-Related Outages by 40%

Proactive impact analysis helps you understand the potential impact of changes, reducing the risk of unplanned downtime.

Improve IT and Business Alignment

By providing a shared view of IT and business services, you can ensure that your IT investments are aligned with your business priorities.

Enhance Visibility and Decision-Making

A clear understanding of your service dependencies enables you to make more informed decisions about your IT strategy, investments, and operations.

Integration with Verto Wave Portfolio

IT Service Management (ITSM)

Enrich your incident, problem, and change management processes with service context, enabling you to prioritize work based on business impact.

Configuration Management

Provide a service-centric view of your CMDB, making it a more valuable and actionable resource for your IT organization.

Security & Resilience

Identify critical assets and their dependencies to prioritize security efforts and develop more effective disaster recovery plans.

Cloud Migration & Optimization

Plan and execute your cloud migrations more effectively by understanding the dependencies between your applications and infrastructure.
